personalInfo.name: Mykhailo Kuptsov
personalInfo.title: Frontend Developer
personalInfo.specialization: Building modern and responsive web applications

education.description: I acquired valuable coding skills through this course, where I learned JavaScript, HTML, CSS, React, and basic Angular. This training provided me with a solid foundation in front-end development, enabling me to create dynamic and responsive web applications. The hands-on experience with these technologies has greatly enhanced my problem-solving abilities and understanding of modern web development frameworks.
At this institution, I developed programming skills in C++, C, and C#. I had to drop out of university because I left the country due to the outbreak of war.

portfolio.name: Portfolio Website
portfolio.description: This website was created to make it easier for you to explore my projects and contact me if needed.

responsibilities: Building modern and responsive web applications.
Editing and producing video content using tools like After Effects, Sony Vegas Pro, and Premiere Pro.
